compatibility.notes: The O-UDA-1.0 license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses, as they may impose additional obligations.

key_requirements: Follow the terms of the O-UDA when using, modifying, or distributing the Data.
Data is provided on an 'AS IS' basis without warranties.
license.name: O-UDA-1.0
obligations: Include all credit or attribution information received with the Data when redistributing.
Require any Downstream Recipient to include the same credit or attribution information.
Include a warranty disclaimer and limitation of liability for Upstream Data Providers in redistribution terms.
